column5: Key Biological Mystery
The "Depression" receptor; has a unique bacterial-like Cache domain.
Habenular receptor linked to nicotine addiction and pain.
Linked to X-linked gigantism; constitutively active (always "on").
Diabetes/obesity target; ECL2 loop blocks its own pocket.
Psychiatric target; a "self-activating" receptor with a built-in tether.
Sonic Hedgehog pathway regulator; structure shows sterol binding.
Linked to obesity; shares a similar self-activation motif with GPR52.
Metabolic sensor; high expression in the habenula.
IBD/Cancer target; structure solved with various mucosal ligands.
Inflammation target; binds medium-chain fatty acids (MCFAs).
Chemokine scavenger; binds ligands but does not signal traditionally.
Adhesion GPCR; activated by mechanical force (mechanosensing).
Schwann cell development; mechanosensitive tethered activation.
Synaptogenesis; binds to specific sugar (synaptamide) patterns.
Chemerin receptor; critical for metabolic inflammation.
Night vision; interacts with Pikachurin to stabilize synapses.
Lung cancer target; Class C receptor with no VFT domain.
Parkinsonâ€™s associated; structure reveals why it's hard to "deorphanize."
Circadian rhythm modulation; highly conserved across brain regions.
Adhesion GPCR; involved in immune cell degranulation.
